<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nemesis Name](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2213)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You want revenge badly enough that you tattoo your nemesis's name in a place you can easily see to remember your vow to settle the score. Anyone who sees the tattoo senses your hatred of the named being. Receiving a new _nemesis name_ makes any you already have non-magical.

You gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls against the creature named on your tattoo, but this nemesis gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls against you.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) **Frequency** once per round;  **Requirements** You can see your nemesis, and they're within 30 feet of you; **Effect** You focus your hatred into a mental scream. Your nemesis takes 3d6 mental damage, which they can resist with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) DC 26 Will save. You take half as much damage as your nemesis does, and you can't reduce this damage in any way.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
